## CollapsibleToolboxCategory.isExpanded() method

Whether the category is expanded to show its child subcategories.

**Signature:**

```typescript
isExpanded(): boolean;
```
**Returns:**

boolean

True if the toolbox item shows its children, false if it is collapsed.
